content: Hi, sorry I read Memory Management in Rustc section in docs, but I still don't get how we use Symbol, I need to know more about Symbol and interning, is there any document that I can read about it?
People here can probably help you. What do you need to do with Symbols?

I am working on a parser issue but I couldn't fix it with debugging, I couldn't find the correct solution, so I decided to read about how lexer and parser work from scratch, to also learn compiler, then through the lexing I see that we use Symbol structure that I could not understand it completely, how it works and why we use it exactly
are you interested in making a PR to add that to the dev-guide? :)
